screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Walmart shopping cart page with a selected item (Rayovac High Energy AA Batteries) in the cart. The cart's subtotal is $21.98, with shipping of $6.99, making the estimated total $28.97. There are options to remove items, save for later, or add more items. The page also displays an offer for earning 5% cash back and an option to give feedback.
action_think: I need to remove all items from the cart and then add a MacBook Air to the cart.
action_plan: click on the Add MacBook Air button
action_desc: click on the Remove button located at the upper middle and left.
action_result: By clicking the "Remove" button, you have successfully removed the Rayovac High Energy AA Batteries from the cart. However, this action has not yet completed the user request as the cart still contains items. To clear all items from the cart, you need to click on the "Remove" button for each item individually. Once all items are removed, you can proceed to add the Macbook Air to the cart by using the search bar to find the product and then selecting it to add it to the cart.
